title.label: Loved it in the past, but doesn’t work on iOS 14

content.label:
I really enjoyed playing this with my young son. It has some challenging puzzles. It created a moving experience and educated us about time during the first Great War.

After leaving it alone for a few years, I wanted to try out the extra chapters, but it doesn’t seem to work under iOS 14. It’s too bad... it would be worth purchasing the IAP content.

It’s a 5-star subject matter, approached thoughtfully and sincerely, but seems to have suffered from a lack of attention.
It's a really nice game, but in iOS 14 has some problems, when I start the game, i just see a black screen!

I had played this game a while back and I wanted to pick it up again but when I open the app there’s nothing visually there. There is only sound but I can’t see anything. When I randomly tap my screen, that’s when I can see some stuff but not the main screen.

Move one morning to go up the ladders he goes down when I want to get down the ladders the Tansey part of the game so hard for me the guy with a gun that will shoot you if he sees you as you’re going to the farm that you need to fast like I just go to get down the latter

whenever i start up the game everything is fine but when it gets to the main menu to start the game it’s just a black screen with two white outlines. it’s really annoying bc i would love to play the game.
I cried for an hour

This game is not too challenging, and it is very educational. In case you haven’t seen the trailer, it follows the lives of 4 great heroes throughout 1914 to 1918 in the Great War. The sadness and happiness, the highs, the lows, everything about it makes a great story and the fact that it’s all based on the letters sent back home to families just enhances the experience. It’s good on mobile, however, it is even better on other platforms. It is free to play chapter 1 on mobile, so you can try the game and see if it is for you if you enjoy the genre. Some of the puzzles are hard, but not many of the action sequences are. An amazing experience already and I haven’t even purchased the other episodes!
Awesome game until you have to buy the last part of the game

Played this game on console and loved it. The only problem with the mobile game version is the audio. Im trying to use my airpods to play the game and the audio sounds horrible. Must be a bug or something but i have restarted the game several times and it still continues.

i LOVE this game, and it would be even better if some more episodes were free. I’ve gotten this game over and over just to do the same episode because it’s exciting. I think that anyone who wants more strategic war games would like this. My only suggestion I will repeat: make more episodes free!!!

One off the best game that ever made

Normally I don’t write reviews, but thought this was something that needed to be shared. It’s a fantastic game, loved every minute of it, and would highly recommend to anyone who enjoys playable novels. My one issue is that when using bluetooth headphones, which many people do these days, the audio is TERRIBLE. It’s like when you’re watching tv and if you don’t have good speakers, the bass will make a grating sound, like the audio is constantly spiking. When I saw another review addressing this issue I thought it would have been fixed by now, but it hasn’t. Please fix this, the music is so great and important in this game, so it’s a really frustrating issue.

title.label: Very good game to be honest

content.label: Good graphic good sound quality 5 star rating for sure!

Controls are very clunky and slow to react to input. Sorry is good but you WILL get stuck several times during the story due to input lag, which is frustrating. Audio also like to bug out and distort if your playing while charging.
It’s a great game but I don’t like that you have to buy the full game it made me mad and upset

title.label: Breathtaking, I would definitely pay to play this

The game it’s self is breath taking I mean everything the music, the dialogue (if you speak the launguges) the graphics the gameplay everything, good job with this game.
